game.name: DCS: Black Shark 3 Upgrade
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: A further development of the well-known Black Shark and Black Shark 2 projects, which are dedicated to the Russian Ka-50 attack helicopter. This is an upgrade for existing owners of the DCS: Black Shark 2
game.shortDescriptionEn: A further development of the well-known Black Shark and Black Shark 2 projects, which are dedicated to the Russian Ka-50 attack helicopter. This is an upgrade for existing owners of the DCS: Black Shark 2
